casebody.data:
Christine GASPERETTI, M.D., Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
DEBORAH HEART AND LUNG CENTER, Lynn McGrath, M.D., and John Ernst, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Jill T. Ojserkis, Esq. and State of New Jersey, Board of Medical Examiners, Defendants. C-744 September Term 2017
080472 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 26, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000244-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
